LocalNMOS

`The BeeWare Project`_. **If you want to see more tools like Briefcase, please

Local NMOS

Windows hints
=================

py -3.12 -m venv .venv

Get-ExecutionPolicy
Set-ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Scope Process

python -m venv .venv
.venv\Scripts\activate
python -m briefcase build
python -m briefcase run
